lead_paragraph: One man connected with the armed takeover of a federal wildlife refuge in Oregon was arrested, and a second was held in the disappearance of a vehicle, the authorities said.
snippet: One man connected with the armed takeover of a federal wildlife refuge in Oregon was arrested, and a second was held in the disappearance of a vehicle, the authorities said.

headline.main: Oregon: Police Arrest Two Tied to Standoff at Refuge
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Police Arrest Two Tied to Standoff at Refuge

abstract: Two men affiliated with armed takeover of Malheur National Wildlife Refuge are arrested in unconnected incidents away from refuge itself; Kenneth Medenbach is charged with unauthorized use of motor vehicle belonging to refuge, and Brian Cavalier is arrested in Arizona on criminal warrant during investigation of suspicious vehicle.
